isis.stitle: 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-14613 - CHANGING THE INPUT SHAFT - REASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: REASSEMBLY

step1.para: If necessary, install a new bushing in the pocket of the input shaft.
Install the new input shaft in the splines of the main drive gear, just far enough to expose the snap ring groove in the I.D. of the drive gear.
Install the snap ring in the groove of the drive gear.
Install the spacer on the input shaft.
Install the drive gear bearing on the input shaft and into the case bore.
Install the bearing retainer snap ring.
Install the front bearing cover and gasket. Make sure to align oil return hole in the case with the hole in the cover.
To facilitate proper re-installation of the shifter housing assembly on the case, make sure the mainshaft sliding clutches are placed in the neutral position.

svcproc.para: Re-install the shifter housing assembly, the front bearing cover and all other parts and assemblies previously removed, making sure to replace the gaskets used.
